Class QuestionAttemptService

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.service.QuestionAttemptService
@Service public class QuestionAttemptService extends Object
the question attempt server used for communication between the program and DB
Author:
Matthew Veldhuizen

    • getQuestionAttemptById

      public QuestionAttempt getQuestionAttemptById(Integer id)
      gets the question attempt object based on the id of the question attempt being seeked
      Parameters:
      id - - the id that needs to be checked for
      Returns:
      - returns the question attempt or null if none are found

    • getAllQuestionAttempts

      public List<QuestionAttempt> getAllQuestionAttempts()
      returns a list of every question attempt in the DB
      Returns:
      - returns a list of all question attempts

    • getQuestionAttemptsByQuestionAndSubmission

      public List<QuestionAttempt> getQuestionAttemptsByQuestionAndSubmission(Integer questionId, Integer submissionID)
      returns a list of question attempts if they match the question and submission ids
      Parameters:
      questionId - - the question id to match the attempt too
      submissionID - - the submission id to match the attempt too
      Returns:
      - returns a list of the questionattempts matching the 2 ids

    • saveOrUpdateQuestionAttempt

      saves or updates the question attempts in the DB
      Parameters:
